name: Bob Rayner Consulting Limited
goal: Bob Rayner Consulting Limited is a government relations and public policy consultancy, aiming to provide strategic advice and support for organisations wishing to engage with the EU institutions
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport, Trade
euInitiatives:
Brexit-related issues
Health and social policy issues (eg EU Alcohol Strategy, health determinants, food labelling).
Agricultural policy issues, including food production and food safety.
Single market internal trade issues.
Digital Single Market issues, including advertising and marketing regulations, broadcasting.
